TEXT_JAVASCRIPT_REQUIRED: JavaScript is required to use this feature.
TEXT_DOCUMENTATION_LINK: Documentation for email templates can be found here.
TEXT_RENDER_ERROR_MESSAGE: This template has a recent error, and failed to send.
PLACEHOLDER_DISPLAY_NAME: Enter a custom name used to identify this template.
TEXT_DISPLAY_NAME_NOTE: The name administrators can refer to this template by.
TEXT_DOMAIN_NOTE_CAN_BE_SPECIFIC: The template will only be used in the context of this domain. Otherwise, another, or the default template, will be chosen.
TEXT_DOMAIN_NOTE_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIC: This template may be shown in the context of multiple domains at once (for example, multiple comments in the same email notification), or may not be in the context of a domain at all. For this reason, this template cannot be domain-specific.
TEXT_LOCALIZATIONS_INFO: Translations are customized on a per-locale basis, as users may comment and speak in different languages. Select the locale you want to customize the translations for.
TEXT_CUSTOMIZE_FROM_NAME_EMAIL: Looking to customize the From Name and From Email? Do that here.
TEXT_TEST_DATA_INFO: Here you can define custom test data used in preview. It is saved along with the template.
